ygData.msgSnippet: (TheCode, my charges aren t impossible to dodge.  You had Scamrock grab them, which would cause them to explode because of impact.  That was your mistake by

(TheCode, my charges aren't impossible to dodge.  You had Scamrock grab them, 
which would cause them to explode because of impact.  That was your mistake 
by doing that.  Also, I read in a few posts that the People's Base exploded, 
I didn't see the actual post where it exploded, and I never saw your 'sister' 
, but evidently since I didn't get the e-mail, you can't blame me)

The Oblitercons (Oblitertron)/Nemesis Enforcer/Anubis/Hades/Unitron/Koga 
Shuko/Scattershot:

Oblitertron raised both of his arms in triumph, splitting into five seperate 
pieces, each transforming into a robot, the Oblitercons landing in a line.

Dark One: "Alright, the base is crushed, this...Dracona's base is in 
ruins...her forces are destroyed."

Breakdown: "I think Nemesis called for reinforcements."

Pyro: "Then let's fire a few shots off and pull back to re-energize."

Hiss: "Yes, let's."

Scavenger raised his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at Scamrock, the 
other Oblitercons charging off towards the Alliance base, not really caring 
about finishing them off, leaving Nemesis and Scattershot alone with the four 
Newcomers.
-------------
Nemesis Enforcer fired two optic blasts at the People's base's rubble, 
turning, a clawed fist sending him slamming into a trunk.  Anubis grabbed him 
by the neck, kneeing him in the face twice, backhanded him with claws.
-------------
Scattershot fired off twenty explosive bullets down randomly at the Radicons, 
deciding he really didn't enjoy them without a bomb, he'd have to go bumb 
some off other people.  Raising an 'eyebrow', he fired off ten shots, Anubis 
slamming into a tree, the tree hitting the ground.  Landing to the ground, 
his side aching from previous wounds, he didn't spot Unitron from behind, six 
laser bolts tearing into the Alliance member's back, sending him crashing to 
the ground.
------------
"Excellent, Unitron.  Let's move out!  Hades, grab Anubis.  It's time to get 
rejuvinated.  The people here shouldn't hinder our plans, their base is 
destroyed."  Unitron ordered, Hades picking Anubis up, the Newcomers heading 
back towards their downed ship to recieve repairs.
